Codeforces Round #737 (Div. 2)

A.Ezzat and Two Subsequences

Difficulty\mathtt{Difficulty}Difficulty=800\mathtt{800}800
çœ‹å®Œé¢˜ç›®åï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¹¶ä¸çŸ¥é“æœ€ä¼˜è§£è¯¥å¦‚ä½•æ„é€

  • ç¬¬ä¸€ç»„ï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆæ˜¯ {1,2}\{1,2\}{1,2} å’Œ {3}\{3\}{3}
  • ç¬¬äºŒç»„ï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆæ˜¯ {âˆ’6,âˆ’7}\{-6,-7\}{âˆ’6,âˆ’7} å’Œ {âˆ’6}\{-6\}{âˆ’6}

ç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸éš¾å¾—åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªçŒœæƒ³ï¼š

å°†æœ€å¤§çš„æ•°å•ç‹¬ä¸ºä¸€ç»„ï¼Œå…¶ä½™ä¸ºä¸€ç»„

ä»£ç å®ç°ç®€å•
è‡³äºè¯æ˜ï¼Œæˆ‘æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå¾ˆå¦™çš„è§£æ³•ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¿™é‡Œå¤ªå°äº†ï¼Œå†™ä¸ä¸‹ğŸ˜†

#include<bits/stdc++.h>

B.Moamen and k-subarrays

Difficulty\mathtt{Difficulty}Difficulty=1100\mathtt{1100}1100
çœ‹å®Œé¢˜ç›®åï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¾—åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªçŒœæƒ³ï¼š

åªè¦å°†åŸä¸²åˆ†æˆé€’å¢çš„å°æ®µå³å¯

ä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬è½»è€Œæ˜“ä¸¾åœ° hackhackhack æ‰äº†
æ¯”å¦‚è¯´å‰é¢æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª {3,6}\{3,6\}{3,6} åé¢æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª {4}\{4\}{4} å°±ç‚¸æ‰äº†
äºæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬ç¨åŠ æ”¹è¿›ï¼Œä¸éš¾å¾—åˆ°ï¼š

åªè¦å°†åŸä¸²åˆ†æˆé€’å¢çš„å°æ®µä¸”æ˜¯æ’å®Œåºç´§æŒ¨çš„å³å¯

ç„¶åå¯ä»¥ç”¨ pair æ¥ä¼˜åŒ–å†™æ³•ï¼Œäºæ˜¯ä»£ç ä¸éš¾å†™å‡º

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define BetterIO ios::sync_with_stdio(false)
using namespace std;
int N,K,A[100001];
pair< int,int >B[100001];
int main(void)
{
	BetterIO;
	register int Case;cin>>Case;while(Case--)
	{
		register int i;cin>>N>>K;
		for(i=1;i<=N;i++)cin>>A[i];
		for(i=1;i<=N;i++)B[i].first=A[i],B[i].second=i;
		sort(B+1,B+N+1);
		register int Ans=0;
		for(i=2;i<=N;i++)if(B[i].second!=B[i-1].second+1)Ans++;
		if(Ans<K)puts("YES");
		else puts("NO");
	}
	return 0;
}

C.Moamen and XOR

Difficulty\mathtt{Difficulty}Difficulty=1700\mathtt{1700}1700
è¿™é“é¢˜ç›®æˆ‘ä»¬åˆ†ç±»è®¨è®ºï¼š

  • è‹¥ 2âˆ£n2\mid n2âˆ£nï¼Œåˆ™
  • è‹¥ 2âˆ¤n2\nmid n2âˆ¤nï¼Œåˆ™
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define BetterIO ios::sync_with_stdio(false)
using namespace std;
#define int long long
#define MOD 1000000007
int N,K,Inv[200001],Fct[200001];
inline int Quickly_Power(int A,int P)
{
    register int Return=1;
    while(P)
    {
        if(P&1)Return*=A,Return%=MOD;
        A*=A,A%=MOD;
        P>>=1;
    }
    return Return%MOD;
}
signed main(void)
{
	BetterIO;
	register int i;Inv[0]=Fct[0]=1;
	for(i=1;i<=200000;i++)Fct[i]=Fct[i-1]*i%MOD,Inv[i]=Inv[i-1]*Quickly_Power(i,MOD-2)%MOD;
	register int Case;cin>>Case;while(Case--)
	{
		cin>>N>>K;
		if(N&1)
		{
			register int S=0;
			for(i=0;i<N;i+=2)S=(S+Inv[i]*Fct[N]%MOD*Inv[N-i]%MOD)%MOD;
			cout<<Quickly_Power((S+1)%MOD,K)<<endl;
		}
		else
		{
			register int S1=0,S2=0;
			for(i=0;i<N;i+=2)S1=(S1+Inv[i]*Fct[N]%MOD*Inv[N-i]%MOD)%MOD;
			for(i=0;i<=N;i++)S2=(S2+Inv[i]*Fct[N]%MOD*Inv[N-i]%MOD)%MOD;
			register int Ans1=0,Ans2=1;
			for(i=1;i<=K;i++)
			{
				Ans1=(Ans1+Ans2*Quickly_Power(S2,K-i))%MOD;
				Ans2=(Ans2*S1)%MOD;
			}
			cout<<(Ans1+Ans2)%MOD<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}

é‚£ä¹ˆï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è¿™æ ·è€ƒè™‘ï¼š

B.Two Tables

Difficulty\mathtt{Difficulty}Difficulty=1300\mathtt{1300}1300
è‚¯å®šæ˜¯æ¨ªç€å¹³ç§»æˆ–è€…ç«–ç€å¹³ç§»æ‰æœ‰å¯èƒ½ä½œä¸ºæœ€çŸ­è·ç¦»
ä¸éš¾å‘ç°ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸€å®šåªèƒ½æŠŠå®ƒç§»åˆ°è¾¹ç•Œä¸Š
é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸å¦¨æšä¸¾ 444 æ¡è¾¹ï¼Œç„¶åä¾æ¬¡åˆ¤æ˜¯å¦å¯è¡Œ
æœ€åå†å–ä¸€ä¸‹ç­”æ¡ˆå³å¯
ç„¶åå°±ä¸éš¾å†™å‡ºä»£ç äº†

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int N,M,A,B,C,D,E,F,P,Q;
signed main(void)
{
    register int Case;cin>>Case;while(Case--)
    {
        cin>>N>>M>>A>>B>>C>>D>>E>>F;
        register int Ans=1000000000;
        P=abs(A-C),Q=abs(B-D);
        if(P+E<=N)Ans=min(Ans,min(max(0,E-N+max(A,C)),max(0,E-min(A,C))));
        if(Q+F<=M)Ans=min(Ans,min(max(0,F-M+max(B,D)),max(0,F-min(B,D))));
        if(Ans>=99999999)cout<<-1<<endl;
        else cout<<Ans<<".000000"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

C.Coin Rows

Difficulty\mathtt{Difficulty}Difficulty=1300\mathtt{1300}1300
çœ‹æ‡‚é¢˜ç›®ä¹‹åï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ¥è§‚å¯Ÿæ ·ä¾‹
æˆ‘ä»¬æå‡ºä¸€ä¸ªçŒœæƒ³ï¼šBob åªèƒ½å…ˆä¸€ç›´å¾€å³ï¼Œå†ä¸€ç›´å¾€ä¸‹æˆ–æ˜¯å…ˆä¸€ç›´å¾€ä¸‹ï¼Œå†ä¸€ç›´å¾€å³
ç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬è€ƒè™‘åˆ†åˆ«ç”¨å‰ç¼€å’Œç»´æŠ¤ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œä¸ç„¶ä¼š TLE\texttt{TLE}TLE
ç»´æŠ¤å®Œä¹‹åï¼Œæš´åŠ›æšä¸¾ Alice çš„è·¯çº¿å³å¯
ç„¶åå°±ä¸éš¾å†™å‡ºä»£ç äº†

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define int long long
int N;
int Dp1[100001],Dp2[100001];
signed main(void)
{
    register int Case;cin>>Case;while(Case--)
    {
        register int i;cin>>N;
        for(i=1;i<=N;i++)Dp1[i]=Dp2[i]=0;
        for(i=1;i<=N;i++){register int X;cin>>X;Dp1[i]=Dp1[i-1]+X;}
        for(i=1;i<=N;i++){register int X;cin>>X;Dp2[i]=Dp2[i-1]+X;}
        register int Ans;
        Ans=min(Dp1[N]-Dp1[1],Dp2[N-1]);
        for(i=2;i<N;i++)Ans=min(Ans,max(Dp1[N]-Dp1[i],Dp2[i-1]));
        if(N==1)Ans=0;
        cout<<Ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

D.Say No to Palindromes

Difficulty\mathtt{Difficulty}Difficulty=1600\mathtt{1600}1600
è¿™é“é¢˜æ”¾åœ¨ç¬¬å››é“ï¼Œå·®è¯„ï¼
å®é™…ä¸Šï¼Œçœ‹æ‡‚é¢˜ç›®ä¹‹åï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸éš¾æƒ³åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªç»“è®ºï¼š

è¯¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸€å®šæ˜¯ a,b,ca,b,ca,b,c çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæ’åˆ—ä¸æ–­é‡å¤

ç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬å¹²è„†æš´åŠ›æšä¸¾ 666 ç§æƒ…å†µï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬ä¼šå‘ç°è‡ªå·± TLE\texttt{TLE}TLE äº†
äºæ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬è€ƒè™‘åŠ ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªå‰ç¼€å’Œç»´æŠ¤ï¼Œç„¶åå·®åˆ†ä¸€æŠŠç­”æ¡ˆå³å¯
ç„¶åå°±ä¸éš¾å†™å‡ºä»£ç äº†

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int N,M;
string S,S0[7]={"","abc","acb","bac","bca","cab","cba"};
int Prefix[7][200011];
int main(void)
{
    register int i,j;cin>>N>>M;cin>>S;S="@"+S;
    for(i=1;i<=6;i++)
    {
        for(j=1;j<=N;j++)if(S0[i][(j-1)%3]!=S[j])Prefix[i][j]=Prefix[i][j-1]+1;
                         else Prefix[i][j]=Prefix[i][j-1];
    }
    while(M--)
    {
        register int Left,Right;cin>>Left>>Right;
        register int Ans=Right-Left+1;
        for(i=1;i<=6;i++)Ans=min(Ans,Prefix[i][Right]-Prefix[i][Left-1]);
        cout<<Ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

E.Boring Segments

Difficulty\mathtt{Difficulty}Difficulty=2100\mathtt{2100}2100
é¢˜æ„æ˜¯æœ€å°åŒ–æœ€å¤§å€¼å’Œæœ€å°å€¼çš„å·®ï¼Œä¸éš¾æƒ³åˆ° two-pointer\texttt{two-pointer}two-pointer
æšä¸¾å·¦ç«¯ç‚¹ï¼Œç„¶åæŠŠä¸Šæ¬¡çš„å³ç«¯ç‚¹ç»§ç»­å‘å³ç§»åŠ¨å³å¯
æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸å¦¨ä½¿ç”¨çº¿æ®µæ ‘æ¥ç»´æŠ¤è¿™ä¸ªåŒºé—´
æ’å…¥ã€åˆ é™¤å°±æ˜¯åœ¨çº¿æ®µæ ‘ [l,râˆ’1][l,r-1][l,râˆ’1] ä¸ŠåŠ å‡ï¼Œç»´æŠ¤åŒºé—´
æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ O(nlogâ¡m)\mathcal{O(n\log m)}O(nlogm)ï¼Œæƒ³å¿…æ˜¯æ­£è§£å§

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
struct Struct
{
    int Left,Right,Value;
    inline bool operator <(const Struct &Compare)const
    {
        return Value<Compare.Value;
    }
};
struct Node
{
    int Tmp,Tag;
};
int N,M;
Struct S[1000010];
Node C[4000040];
inline void Pd(int Rt)
{
    if(C[Rt].Tag)
    {
        C[Rt*2].Tag+=C[Rt].Tag;
        C[Rt*2+1].Tag+=C[Rt].Tag;
        C[Rt*2].Tmp+=C[Rt].Tag;
        C[Rt*2+1].Tmp+=C[Rt].Tag;
    }
    C[Rt].Tag=0;
}
inline void Pu(int Rt)
{
    C[Rt].Tmp=min(C[Rt*2].Tmp,C[Rt*2+1].Tmp);
}
inline void Add(int Rt,int L,int R,int LL,int RR,int VV)
{
    if(L>=LL&&R<=RR){C[Rt].Tag+=VV,C[Rt].Tmp+=VV;return;}
    Pd(Rt);
    if((L+R>>1)>=LL)Add(Rt*2,L,(L+R>>1),LL,RR,VV);
    if((L+R>>1)<RR)Add(Rt*2+1,(L+R>>1)+1,R,LL,RR,VV);
    Pu(Rt);
}
int main(void)
{
    register int i,Cnt=0,Ans=INT_MAX,T=0;
    cin>>N>>M,M--;
    for(i=1;i<=N;i++)cin>>S[i].Left>>S[i].Right>>S[i].Value,S[i].Right--;
    sort(S+1,S+N+1);
    while(!C[1].Tmp)Cnt++,Add(1,1,M,S[Cnt].Left,S[Cnt].Right,1);
    Add(1,1,M,S[Cnt].Left,S[Cnt].Right,-1);
    for(i=Cnt;i<=N;i++)
    {
        Add(1,1,M,S[i].Left,S[i].Right,1);
        while(C[1].Tmp)T++,Add(1,1,M,S[T].Left,S[T].Right,-1);
        Add(1,1,M,S[T].Left,S[T].Right,1);
        Ans=min(Ans,S[i].Value-S[T].Value),T--;
    }
    cout<<Ans<<endl;
    return 0;
}
